Let's Have Fun Festival
22  February,  2024
The festival for social sports integration was held in partnership and cooperation with Best Buddies Qatar and Al Yarmouk Preparatory School under the sponsorship of Qatar Sports Club. The number of participants in the festival reached 70 members from Best Buddies Qatar clubs, consisting of preparatory schoolboys from seven schools and the Shafallah Center for Persons with Disabilities. The festival included various entertainment and competitive sports activities to foster engagement and integration.
